publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7735.2 John Swinney: Protecting Public Servicesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-7735) in the name of Patrick Harvie, leave out from "ministers" to end and insert "all parties in the Parliament to work together to deliver a balanced budget that will safeguard services and strengthen economic growth for Scotland."
